slide.title: Document/Literal Example
slide.example:
<?php
require_once('SOAP/Client.php');

$client = new SOAP_Client("http://www.epionet.com/epiowavewebservices/livecitycams/livecitycams.asp", 0);

$result = $client->call("ListLiveCityCams", 
        NULL, 
        array('namespace'=>
                'http://www.epionet.com/webservices/epiowebservices/livecitycams.wsdl',
            'soapaction'=>
                'http://www.epionet.com/webservices/epiowebservices/livecitycams/listlivecitycams',
            'style'=>'document',
            'use'=>'literal')); 

print $client->wire;

foreach($result as $citycam) {
    $cam = $client->call("GetLiveCityCam", 
        array("citycamid"=>$citycam->camid), 
        array('namespace'=>
                'http://www.epionet.com/webservices/epiowebservices/livecitycams.wsdl',
            'soapaction'=>
                'http://www.epionet.com/webservices/epiowebservices/livecitycams/getlivecitycam',
            'style'=>'document',
            'use'=>'literal')); 
    echo "$cam\n";
}

?>
